mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doctor (doctor_id, doctor_pwd, doctor_number, doctor_name, doctor_age, doctor_email, doctor_img, career, ancestry, society, subject_name) VALUES (#{doctorId}, #{doctorPwd}, #{doctorNumber}, #{doctorName}, #{doctorAge}, #{doctorEmail}, #{doctorImg}, #{career}, #{ancestry}, #{society}, #{subjectName})
mapper.update: UPDATE doctor SET doctor_pwd = #{doctorPwd}, doctor_number = #{doctorNumber}, doctor_name = #{doctorName}, doctor_age = #{doctorAge}, doctor_email = #{doctorEmail}, doctor_img = #{doctorImg}, career = #{career}, ancestry = #{ancestry}, society = #{society}, subject_name = #{subjectName} WHERE doctor_id = #{doctorId}
